title: REGION HACKED!?
body: This is an account i just made to post this, but my main account got hacked. I got a message saying this account was logged in from another pc so i tried logging in but i had the wrong info. Thankfully, i was able to change my password before the hackers could but even with the correct password, it says im in a different region. I guess my region was changed, but whenever i check lolking or any other website, it says that my account is still in NA. I submitted a support ticket but still, nothing. I've had this account for years and i don't want to lose all my champions and skins. Pleas help!

replies.body:
We can assist you in recovering this account if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and fill out as much information about the account that you can recall.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting that ticket.
I've left two tickets and no one is helping me... i've also left a post.. ive spent so much money on this game and to lose it all is very very frustrating

We've had quite a lot of tickets submitted recently, so response times are a bit longer than what is considered *normal*. Our specialists will get back to you on your ticket as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
